Package chess.interfaces

package chess.interfaces
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    chess
     
    chess.units
     
    chess.utility
     
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    IChessboard
    Represents a chessboard.
    IChessboardSquare
    Represents a square on a chessboard.
    IChessMatch
    Represents a chess match.
    IChessMove
    Defines the move a chess piece is capable of according to the current situation on the chessboard.
    IChessMoveInfo
    Defines how a movement is performed by defining the number of steps it can take and the direction (delta file, delta rank) the step is in.
    IChessPiece
     
    IGhost
    Provides a utility to assist in the determination of legal moves.
